MultiFeature.Name: Third Eye
MultiFeature.Text: This discipline can open a third eye within your mind, opening your doors of perception.

Feature.Name: Third Eye - Psychic Focus
Feature.Text: While focused on this discipline, you have blindsight with a radius of 30 feet.

Feature.Name: Third Eye - Tremorsense (1, C)
Feature.Text: As a bonus action, you gain tremorsense with a radius of 30 feet for up to 1 minute.

Feature.Name: Third Eye - Unwavering Eye (1, C)
Feature.Text: As a bonus action, you gain advantage on Wisdom checks for up to 1 minute.

Feature.Name: Third Eye - Truesight (5, C)
Feature.Text: As a bonus action, you gain truesight with a radius of 30 feet for up to 1 minute.

MultiFeature.Source: Unearthed Arcana 6 - Psionics and the Mystic, Take 2
